moves.2... d5: I had spoken with chess queen Miss L. and she suggested I try this, for an "interesting" game. But she didn't tell me what to do AFTER this move.
moves.3. fxe5: I figured one of my Pawns would be captured...
moves.3... Bc5: I've never done this before, but I figured development would be good...
moves.4. exd5: There goes my other central Pawn...
moves.4... Qh4+: Any time I can get this in safely, that's always a good thing...
moves.5. Ke2: Um... I was thinking that 5 P-N3 was better, but I wasn't going to say anything out loud.
moves.5... Qe4#: Well, that's the game... it was indeed interesting...
